description: Discover the best hotels in Vienna, Austria. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Five-Star Vienna City Escape Overlooking Stadtpark near Vienna State Opera
hotels.description: Visit the motherland of musical masterpieces and coffee-house culture when you stay at the five-star InterContinental Vienna, an IHG Hotel, placed moments from iconic sights like the world-renowned Vienna State Opera and the stylish shopping district Kaerntner Strasse. Beyond the crystal chandeliers and classic décor are the exceptional Intermezzo Bar - a sultry cocktail den - and the eclectic Parlor restaurant, serving up Austrian and international specialties.

hotels.title: Luxurious Heritage Vienna Escape in the Heart of the City with Rooftop Terrace and Grand Spa
hotels.description: Welcome to the elegant and exquisite Grand Hotel Wien, an IHG Hotel, nestled in the heart of vibrant Vienna. With a history dating back to 1870, this impressive gem has been lovingly restored to include 205 rooms and suites, seven restaurants and bars, a state-of-the-art spa and a spectacular rooftop summer terrace. Just moments away from the world-renowned Vienna State Opera and the shopping mile of Kaerntner Strasse, it couldn't be better placed for a relaxing city break.

hotels.title: Circus-Inspired Vienna City Break near MuseumsQuartier Wien with Rooftop Bar & Onsite Sauna
hotels.description: Step right up to Vienna's best - including its world-famous museums - at this decidedly offbeat city hideaway, located just steps from many of the city's most renowned sights. Find yourself a nearby cafe to sample a Viennese coffee or spend the day exploring the wonders of the Kunsthistorisches Museum Wien. After days of exploration, sweat it out in the sauna, then refuel with rustic Italin antipasti at RIBELLI and tap-pours at beer garden KVETCH. Later, hop on a hotel bike to chase Vienna’s baroque backstreets or rise above it all at the rooftop bar DACHBODEN, where live music, local wines and skyline views converge to create unforgettable nights.

hotels.title: Vibrant Vienna Urban Retreat with Stunning Rooftop Garden
hotels.description: Vienna's buzzing city centre is just a stone's throw from the ultra-stylish Hotel Indigo Vienna - Naschmarkt, an IHG Hotel. Discover a rooftop garden, a leafy courtyard and a terrace, all within walking distance from the state opera and the museums on the Ringstrasse. Hidden among the hotel's secret gardens is the celebrated Pigment restaurant, a must-try venue in Vienna that prides itself on its simple, locally sourced dishes presented in a new and innovative way.

hotels.title: Central Vienna Heritage Stay near Karlskirche with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Step into refined Viennese elegance just steps from the world-renowned Musikverein and the grand Vienna State Opera. Each artfully designed room at Hotel Am Konzerthaus Vienna - MGallery pays homage to the city’s rich musical heritage, with bespoke furnishings and curated artwork reflecting the creative spirit of Austria’s capital. Begin your day with a gourmet breakfast at APRON, the hotel’s Michelin-starred restaurant, or stroll to the Belvedere Palace to admire Klimt’s masterpieces. In the evening, enjoy expertly crafted cocktails at the chic onsite bar before exploring the vibrant Naschmarkt’s eclectic food stalls and artisan shops.

hotels.title: Charming Vienna Haven near Historic Prater Amusement Park
hotels.description: For a delightful escape blending modernity and Viennese charm, plus a touch of whimsy, head to voco Vienna Prater, an IHG Hotel, an urban stay located just a five-minute drive from one of Europe's oldest amusement parks - Prater. After a day spent atop the Ferris wheel or admiring the perfectly preserved attractions of Prater, head back to the hotel for a classic cocktail at the onsite Bluebird Bar or a hearty meal at Vienna Vibe restaurant.

seo.title: Hotels in Vienna - Austria Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Vienna, Austria with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
